snippet: With early signs of a recovery appearing, the new finance minister, Gikas Hardouvelis, is projecting optimism before meeting with international creditors.
abstract: Greek Finance Minister Gikas Hardouvelis expresses his optimism about country's economic future; is the first finance minister since onset of country's four-year economic crisis to assume his role in face of predictions that things will get better rather than worse.
lead_paragraph: With early signs of a recovery appearing, the new finance minister, Gikas Hardouvelis, is projecting optimism before meeting with international creditors.

headline.main: Seeing Just One Way for Greece to Go: Up
headline.print_headline: New Greece Finance Minister Sees Just One Way for Nation to Go: Up
